description: This project aims to enhance the subscriber management system by improving the user experience, increasing engagement, and streamlining the subscription process. The goal is to attract more subscribers, retain existing ones, and provide better tools for managing subscriptions.

userStories.title: Improve Subscriber Onboarding
userStories.description: As a new user, I want a simplified and guided onboarding process so that I can quickly understand the benefits of subscribing and complete the subscription process without confusion.
acceptanceCriteria: Onboarding flow is streamlined with clear steps and minimal required information.
Progress indicator is visible during the onboarding process.
Help tooltips or guides are available for each step.
Users can save their progress and resume later.

userStories.title: Enhance Subscriber Engagement
userStories.description: As a subscriber, I want personalized content and recommendations so that I can stay engaged and find value in my subscription.
acceptanceCriteria: Subscribers receive personalized content based on their preferences and behavior.
Recommendation engine is integrated into the platform.
Subscribers can update their preferences easily.
Engagement metrics (e.g., time spent, content interactions) are tracked and used to refine recommendations.

userStories.title: Implement Subscription Management Dashboard
userStories.description: As a subscriber, I want a centralized dashboard to manage my subscription so that I can easily view my plan, payment details, and usage statistics.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays current subscription plan, billing cycle, and next billing date.
Subscribers can update payment methods and billing information.
Usage statistics (e.g., data usage, feature limits) are visible.
Option to upgrade/downgrade plan or cancel subscription is available.

userStories.title: Add Subscriber Retention Features
userStories.description: As a subscriber, I want to receive reminders and incentives to renew my subscription so that I donâ€™t miss out on valuable content.
acceptanceCriteria: Automated email/SMS reminders are sent before subscription renewal.
Incentives (e.g., discounts, exclusive content) are offered for early renewal.
Subscribers can set custom renewal reminders.
Retention metrics are tracked and analyzed.

userStories.title: Improve Subscriber Support
userStories.description: As a subscriber, I want quick and efficient support so that I can resolve any issues with my subscription without delays.
acceptanceCriteria: Dedicated support channel (e.g., live chat, ticketing system) for subscribers.
FAQ section with common subscription-related questions and answers.
Response time for support requests is tracked and optimized.
Subscribers can escalate issues if not resolved promptly.

userStories.title: Implement Analytics for Subscriber Insights
userStories.description: As a product manager, I want analytics and insights into subscriber behavior so that I can make data-driven decisions to improve the subscription service.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard for viewing subscriber acquisition, retention, and churn rates.
Insights into subscriber demographics and preferences.
Exportable reports for further analysis.
Integration with existing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Mixpanel).

userStories.title: Ensure Compliance and Security
userStories.description: As a subscriber, I want my data to be secure and compliant with regulations so that I can trust the platform with my personal information.
acceptanceCriteria: Subscription data is encrypted and stored securely.
Compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other relevant regulations.
Regular security audits and updates.
Clear privacy policy and terms of service for subscribers.
